Plot: Lost in a lustful musical daydream, Cooper Matthews fails the biggest exam of his life. Now the only way to keep his scholarship is to seduce his scalding hot teaching assistant.
Title: College Musical
Writer: Jake Bruene (screenplay), Jake Bruene (story), Andrew Johnson (story), Kurt Hugo Schneider (story)
Actors: Sam Tsui, Julie Shain, Miles Jacoby, Allison Williams
